original_title: Sex Pistols: The Filthy Lucre Tour - Live in Japan
overview: The concert was recorded live on the Japanese leg of the band's Filthy Lucre Tour.  This release is unique in that it is the only officially available full-length visual record of the band's performances on their 1996 Filthy Lucre Tour.  Tracklist:  1. Bodies 2. Seventeen 3. New York 4. No Feelings"  5. Did You No Wrong 6. God Save the Queen 7. Liar 8. Satellite 9. (I'm Not Your) Stepping Stone 10. Submission 11. Holidays in the Sun 12. Pretty Vacant 13. EMI 14. Anarchy in the UK 15. Problems
title: Sex Pistols: The Filthy Lucre Tour - Live in Japan
